These provisions are just the beginning. To learn more about how the #GREENAct helps our climate, our citizens, and our economy check out https://larson.house.gov/media-center/press-releases/larson-ways-and-means-democrats-introduce-tax-incentives-tackle-climate …

Connecticut is home to national leaders in green energy innovation. The #GREENAct incentivizes domestic manufacturing and clean energy jobs – including ensuring that Connecticut’s fuel cell industry can continue to make groundbreaking clean energy advancements.

One of the most effective ways someone can reduce their carbon footprint is by making their home energy efficient. The #GREENAct will make home projects like solar panels and efficiency audits more affordable.
The #GREENAct creates a new tax credit so low income Americans can afford electric vehicles, lowering their transportation costs and cleaning their commutes.
Yesterday I joined @WaysMeansCmte Democrats to unveil the #GREENAct to tackle #ClimateChange head on. Our bill will help consumers, spur job creation, and lower emissions.
